name: Lead Discovery
description:
Lead Discovery has been the quiet leader in digital marketing since 1998. Our lead generation services combining brand strategy, Â platform development with PPC, SEO, social media, web design and analytics have fueled over $600 million in sales across 150 companies.
Working directly with clients as a digital marketing agency, Lead Discovery applies our core knowledge in the SEM space to grow their brand value, online reputations, prospects and sales.
